title: How to Make Ferchirajas

steps.headline: Put the poblano on a griddle or on a grill.
Grill and peel the burnt skin off the peppers.
Take off the seeds from the inside of the peppers.
Add one onion not the red put the onion in a skillet to simmer.
Add a chicken soup cube and let it simmer.
steps.description: And add a clove of garlic.

steps.headline: Leave onion in for five minutes.
Put the poblano peppers and 10 mushrooms in the onion and chicken soup flavored seasoning.
steps.description: Add some sour cream and also add corn kernels to be cooked.

text: Put the poblano on a griddle or on a grill.  Grill and peel the burnt skin off the peppers.  Take off the seeds from the inside of the peppers.  Add one onion not the red put the onion in a skillet to simmer.  Add a chicken soup cube and let it simmer. And add a clove of garlic. Leave onion in for five minutes.  Put the poblano peppers and 10 mushrooms in the onion and chicken soup flavored seasoning. Add some sour cream and also add corn kernels to be cooked. Cook for 20 minutes and serve.  Finished.
